function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Disturbance of air and dispersal of airborne aerosols due to movement of people within enclosed spaces.","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Highly turbulent wake with a reynolds number of about 10^5 in spaces with high people density and movement.","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"A cloud of infected aerosol may be mixed by the wakes of many people in spaces like supermarkets, increasing the risk of exposure to subsequent individuals.","category":"Inadequate adoption of health-focused building standards","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"The settling time of small aerosols being comparable to ventilation timescales, leading to prolonged exposure to aerosols in indoor spaces.","category":"Inadequate adoption of health-focused building standards","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The dispersal of contagious aerosol in buildings may lead to significant airborne transmission of diseases due to people movement, affecting individuals in the built environment.","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High risk of exposure to small aerosols due to the movement of people in buildings","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Residence time of small aerosols leading to prolonged exposure","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to increased residence time of small aerosols","category":"Inadequate urban planning","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenging to quantify occupants’ exposure to airborne virus particles, leading to difficulty in estimating the likelihood of airborne infection.","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unknown presence and location of infectious occupants within indoor spaces","category":"Inadequate adaptability to emerging problems  ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate measurement of ventilation rates leading to assumption of adequate outdoor air supply","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on co2 data for inferring the risk of airborne infection","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex ventilation flows and air flow between spaces","category":"Inadequate urban planning","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability of covid-19 airborne spread based on environmental conditions and activity level","category":"Inadequate adaptability to emerging problems  ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitations of increasing ventilation in winter","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Centralized recirculation systems not effective at filtering out viral material","category":"Inadequate urban planning","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited supply of clean air in spaces due to filter effectiveness and flow rate","category":"Inadequate urban planning","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective air filtration in certain areas of the room due to airflow patterns and room size","category":"Inadequate urban planning","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited effectiveness of air cleaners/filters","category":"Inadequate urban planning","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transporting virus-laden droplets with ductless pv system","category":"Improper architectural designs","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased re-suspension of virus-laden particles due to desk or ceiling fans","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of increased rates of deposition of virus-laden particles due to fan usage","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ceiling fans inhibiting the vertical mixing and dilution of virus-laden particles within the breathing zone","category":"Inadequate urban planning","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain effectiveness of air ionization technology in eliminating sars-cov-2 and potential production of by-products such as ozone","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"The use of screens may mitigate the risk of transmission for larger droplets, but may not effectively reduce the risk of airborne transmission smaller droplets or droplet nuclei .","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Installation of screens may lead to stagnant or recirculating airflow patterns, creating areas where viruses could accumulate.","category":"Inadequate adaptability to emerging problems  ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Upper room ultra-violet germicidal irradiation uvgi may pose a risk if not implemented or maintained properly, leading to potential exposure to harmful uv radiation.","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex sizing and installation of upper room uv systems","category":"Inadequate urban planning","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty and limited evidence regarding the effectiveness of air ionization against viruses","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of desk and ceiling fans may have uncertainties regarding their impact on virus-laden particle re-suspension and deposition","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential impact of screens on circulation of air and local ventilation provision, and on fire safety","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to airborne transmission of covid-19","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deployment in university facilities, office buildings, and industrial facilities","category":"Inadequate urban planning","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of ieq monitoring systems in buildings","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of indoor environmental quality ieq variables could lead to undetected environmental hazards and poor air quality.","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Centralized configuration of ieq monitoring system","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Local collection of data at ieq concentrator","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of vlan intranet to separate ieq monitoring traffic from mainstream internet traffic.","category":"Improper architectural designs","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ieee802.11 and ieee802.1q as standards for wifi technology and vlan","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ieq concentrator holding the mqtt broker for connecting all ieq sensor nodes in the area","category":"Inadequate adaptability to emerging problems  ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deployment of smart ieq sensor nodes anywhere in the premises may lead to incomplete or uneven coverage of monitoring.","category":"Inadequate adaptability to emerging problems  ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate wifi coverage may limit the deployment of smart ieq sensor nodes, leading to incomplete monitoring of certain areas within the built environment.","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Configurable quantity and types of sensors may lead to inadequate coverage for monitoring key parameters","category":"Inadequate adaptability to emerging problems  ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Centralization of the ieq monitoring system may lead to a single point of failure for the entire system, increasing the risk of widespread impact if the central system fails.","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in the staff office","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation during door and window opening","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor ventilation due to open windows","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent temperature and humidity distribution","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Intermittent loss of wifi communication in the laboratory","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in relative humidity levels within the laboratory","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Medium"}]}
